content.rendered:
FOR FOSS4G – ASIA 2021 CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS, CLICK HERE

A BIG HEARTFELT THANK YOU TO ALL THOSE WHO MADE THE CONFERENCE A GRAND SUCCESS – THE PARTICPANTS, WORKSHOP FACULTY, SPONSORS, COMMITTEE MEMBERS, VOLUNTEERS and ALL OTHER CONTRIBUTORS.

WE LOOK FORWARD TO MEETING YOU ALL AT THE NEXT FOSS4G ASIA !!!

The 2021
DAVID A. HASTINGS AWARD

for outstanding contributions to the FOSS4G communities in Asia was awarded to

MARTIN ISENBERG

at the Kathmandu University, Dhulikhel, Nepal
on 2nd October 2021.

FOR DETAILS OF KEYNOTE SPEAKERS CLICK HERE
FOR WORKSHOPS SCHEDULE CLICK HERE
FOR THE FINAL CONFERENCE PROGRAM CLICK HERE
FOR DETAILS OF THE DAVID HASTINGS AWARD CLICK HERE

FOSS4G-Asia 2021 is an international gathering of the Asian Free and Open Source Software for Geoinformatics Community. FOSS4G-Asia 2021 aims to support the global agenda of sustainable development goals including land management and contribute to Artificial Intelligence and IoT by bringing researchers, professionals, developers, students, and other stakeholders in Asia on a common platform. “FOSS4G-Asia 2021” will be hosted at Kathmandu University by the Department of Geomatics Engineering with support from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering and Land Management Training Centre.

Considering the situation brought about by the Covid-19 pandemic at a global scale, and the current situation in the host country, we are proud to organize the conference in  “Hybrid Mode” between 1-2 October 2021 at Kathmandu University, Dhulikhel, Nepal. A pre-conference training Workshop event will be held on 30 September 2021.

See at FOSS4G-Asia 2021! Take Care and Stay Safe!!

Dr. Reshma Shrestha (FOSS4G-Asia 2021 Coordinator, KU)
Assistant Professor
Department of Geomatics Engineering
Kathmandu University, Nepal

Natraj Vaddadi (FOSS4G-Asia 2021 Coordinator, CERG)
Executive Director
Centre for Education & Research in Geosciences,
India
